org.jbox2d.common

Class Mat22

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbox2d.common.Mat22
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Mat22
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A 2-by-2 matrix. Stored in column-major order.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
